meanings.sent1: The color of the pen was inconsequential to the story.
meanings.sent2: The small scratch on the table was inconsequential and easily overlooked.
meanings.sent3: The inconsequential size of the toy car made it adorable.
meanings.sent4: Her inconsequential role in the play felt like a fleeting breeze.
meanings.sent5: The inconsequential details in the painting added a touch of charm.

meanings.sent1: The decision to wear a blue shirt was inconsequential in the grand scheme of things.
meanings.sent2: His absence was inconsequential to the success of the project.
meanings.sent3: The inconsequential delay in the train schedule caused laughter among the passengers.
meanings.sent4: The inconsequential chatter of birds filled the morning air.
meanings.sent5: The inconsequential error in the calculation led to a big misunderstanding.
